channel.title: Please Answer! How can I get NPCS, to drop what I want not like god armour
channel.description:
Ok well I know how to make them drop things, but in the NPC.cfg file, I set them say a 'man' to drop 15 coins and he does drop that but also bones and low level items and occasionally d meds and god armour...? Then barrows even though I tell them to drop the right armour I never get barrows armour :(. So any idea what I could do please to make them drop what I want. Im using realistic scape source. Also what does 'drop type' mean?
Thankyou.
Mankk

item.title: Please Answer! How can I get NPCS, to drop what I want not like god armour
